## isLowSpecDevice() function

Whether the device does not have a GPU capable of processing enough. (Experimental Features)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isLowSpecDevice(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

Intended to be used to adjust texture size, processing load, etc. The current implementation is a very tentative decision and needs to be improved.
